common.prizeInfo:
Prize (s) that can be handed to the winners are limited to one prize package per one
                  winner. Prizes are not subject to transmission and cannot be replaced by other prizes. When
                  lack of an affordable prize, at their discretion, sponsors reserve the right to replace
                  Prize equal/larger cost. All taxes, tips and unsecured expenses are exceptional
                  responsibility of the winner. Winners are all responsible for using their prizes.
